mod.name: The Alterego
mod.description: The Alterego of love and hate, Passionlip!

cards.name: Big Meaty Claws
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Durga.
Add X *Shivs to your hand.

cards.name: Big Meaty Claws+
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Durga.
Add X+2 *Shivs to your hand.

cards.name: Brynhildr's Rune
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Brynhildr.
Gain 1 Dexterity.
Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Brynhildr's Rune+
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Brynhildr.
Gain 2 Dexterity.
Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Impale
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Parvati.
Gain 2 Strength.
Enemy gains 2 Strength.
Deal 8 damage.

cards.name: Impale+
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Parvati.
Gain 3 Strength.
Enemy gains 1 Strength.
Deal 10 damage.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: 1 Ton Wallop
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Take 4 damage.

cards.name: 1 Ton Wallop+
cards.description:
Deal 21 damage and apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Take 4 damage.

cards.name: Bi-Furious
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength this turn.
Deal 3 damage twice.

cards.name: Bi-Furious+
cards.description:
Gain 2 Strength this turn.
Deal 4 damage twice.

cards.name: Birthday
cards.description:
Heal 2 HP.
Draw a card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Birthday+
cards.description:
Heal 3 HP.
Draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bounce
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
alterego_mod:Swipe a *Bounce.

cards.name: Bounce+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
alterego_mod:Swipe a *Bounce.

cards.name: Complex
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Apply 1 Frail.

cards.name: Complex+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Apply 2 Frail.

cards.name: Cooking
cards.description:
Heal 3 HP.
Apply 1 Poison.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Cooking+
cards.description:
Heal 4 HP.
Apply 2 Poison.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Cycle
cards.description:
Change Stance:
alterego_mod:Durga to alterego_mod:Parvati.
alterego_mod:Parvati to alterego_mod:Brynhildr.
alterego_mod:Brynhildr to alterego_mod:Durga.

cards.name: Cycle+
cards.description:
Change Stance:
alterego_mod:Durga to alterego_mod:Parvati.
alterego_mod:Parvati to alterego_mod:Brynhildr.
alterego_mod:Brynhildr to alterego_mod:Durga.
None to Calm.

cards.name: Deft Hands
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
In alterego_mod:Durga, gain 1 Dexterity.
In alterego_mod:Brynhildr, gain 4 Block.
In alterego_mod:Parvati, your and the enemy's next attacks deal 1 more damage.

cards.name: Deft Hands+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
In alterego_mod:Durga, gain 1 Dexterity.
In alterego_mod:Brynhildr, gain 4 Block.
In alterego_mod:Parvati, your and the enemy's next attacks deal 1 more damage.

cards.name: Disco Lights
cards.description: Every other time you play a *Shiv, gain 1 Temporary_HP.

cards.name: Disco Lights+
cards.description: Every time you play a *Shiv, gain 1 Temporary_HP.

cards.name: Goddess' Core
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Gain 1 Artifact.

cards.name: Goddess' Core+
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
Gain 2 Artifact.

cards.name: High Servant
cards.description: alterego_mod:Swipe a card that would change your Stance.

cards.name: High Servant+
cards.description: alterego_mod:Swipe a card that would change your Stance.

cards.name: Jiggle
cards.description: Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Jiggle+
cards.description: Apply 2 Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Magic Resistance
cards.description:
Gain 2 Artifact.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Magic Resistance+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Artifact.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Maid
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage 3 times.
Lose 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Maid+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage 3 times.
Lose 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Mirror
cards.description: Perform the enemy's intent on them.

cards.name: Mirror+
cards.description: Perform the enemy's intent on ALL enemies.

cards.name: Perception Disorder
cards.description:
Gain 3 Strength.
You won't see enemy intents until the end of combat.

cards.name: Perception Disorder+
cards.description:
Gain 5 Strength.
You won't see enemy intents until the end of combat.

cards.name: Pet
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Pet+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Punishment
cards.description:
Each turn, gain [E].
At the end of each turn, lose 1 HP for each card in your hand.

cards.name: Punishment+
cards.description:
Each turn, gain [E].
At the end of each turn, lose 1 HP for every 2 cards in your hand.

cards.name: Ripped
cards.description:
Autoplay.
Gain 1 Strength and 1 Frail.

cards.name: Ripped+
cards.description:
Autoplay.
Gain 1 Strength and 1 Frail.
Your next Attack deals 5 additional damage.

cards.name: Skirt
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Scry 2.

cards.name: Skirt+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Scry 3.

cards.name: Trash & Crash
cards.description: Exhaust any number of cards, gain 1 Strength for each card exhausted.

cards.name: Trash & Crash+
cards.description: Exhaust any number of cards, gain 2 Strength for each card exhausted.

cards.name: Undulate
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block.
Whenever you change Stances, return this from the Discard Pile to your hand.

cards.name: Undulate+
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Whenever you change Stances, return this from the Discard Pile to your hand.

cards.name: "Clones"
cards.description: Add a copy of a card in your hand to your hand. The copy gains Retain.

cards.name: "Clones"+
cards.description: Add two copies of a card in your hand to your hand. The copies gain Retain.

cards.name: Be Gentle
cards.description: Enemy heals 10 and loses its action this turn.

cards.name: Be Gentle+
cards.description: Enemy heals 7 and loses its action this turn.

cards.name: Belle
cards.description:
Fleeting.
Deal damage equal to your gold.

cards.name: Belle+
cards.description:
Fleeting.
Deal damage equal to your gold.
Startup: Gain 5 gold.

cards.name: Belts
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage X times.
Whenever you attack this enemy, gain alterego_mod:Best Of X Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Belts+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage X times.
Whenever you attack this enemy, gain alterego_mod:Best Of 2X Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bloomers
cards.description:
Exhaust a card.
If it was a curse or status, draw 2.

cards.name: Bloomers+
cards.description:
Exhaust up to 2 cards.
Draw 2 for each curse or status exhausted.

cards.name: Boob Pocket
cards.description:
Purge a card from your hand.
Startup: alterego_mod:Swipe all cards this purged last combat.

cards.name: Boob Pocket+
cards.description:
Purge a card from your hand.
Startup: alterego_mod:Swipe all cards this purged last combat.

cards.name: Breast Valley
cards.description: Whenever a card is exhausted, gain X+ 2 Block.

cards.name: Breast Valley+
cards.description:
Whenever a card is exhausted, gain X+ 2 Block.
Refund 1.

cards.name: Bunnysuit
cards.description: Discard five cards, draw that many.

cards.name: Bunnysuit+
cards.description: Discard up to five cards, draw that many.

cards.name: Bust Out
cards.description:
Lose all Block, heal that much.
Lose all Dexterity, gain that much Strength.

cards.name: Bust Out+
cards.description:
Lose all Block, heal that much.
Lose all Dexterity, gain that much Strength.

cards.name: Buster Card
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Add a copy of this card to your discard pile.
If this is the third *Buster *Card you've played this turn, double your Strength.

cards.name: Buster Card+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Add a copy of this card to your discard pile.
If this is the third *Buster *Card you've played this turn, triple your Strength.

cards.name: Challenge Complete
cards.description: Gain 5 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Challenge Complete+
cards.description: Gain 8 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Clap
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Durga.
This turn, your next Attack is played twice.

cards.name: Clap+
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Durga.
This turn, your next two Attacks are played twice.

cards.name: Collar
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage twice.
Whenever you play a card this turn, the enemy loses 3 HP.

cards.name: Collar+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage twice.
Whenever you play a card this turn, the enemy loses 5 HP.

cards.name: Crossover
cards.description: Add a random card from another character to your hand.

cards.name: Crossover+
cards.description: Add a random card from another character to your hand.

cards.name: Cushion
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Cushion+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible.
Exhaust.
Shuffle a *Cushion into your draw pile.

cards.name: Destruction of Property
cards.description: Remove a random power from all combatants.

cards.name: Destruction of Property+
cards.description: Remove X random powers from all combatants.

cards.name: Dust Data
cards.description:
Fleeting.
Kill a non-boss enemy.
Become cursed: *Regret.

cards.name: Dust Data+
cards.description:
Fleeting.
Kill a non-boss enemy.

cards.name: Exercise
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Durga.
Deal 5 damage.
If you have positive Strength, play this card once more.

cards.name: Exercise+
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Durga.
Deal 5 damage.
If you have positive Strength or were already in alterego_mod:Durga, play this card once more.

cards.name: Gacha Ticket
cards.description: The next time you play a card of a random type this turn, it is played twice.

cards.name: Gacha Ticket+
cards.description: The next time you play a card of a random type this turn, it is played twice.

cards.name: Independent Action
cards.description:
Gain [E] .
Increase this card's energy gain by 1 until the end of combat.

cards.name: Independent Action+
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E] .
Increase this card's energy gain by 1 until the end of combat.

cards.name: Lingerie
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Parvati.
Deal 8 damage.
Gain 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Lingerie+
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Parvati.
Deal 11 damage.
Gain 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Maintain Eye Contact
cards.description: Enemy loses 3 Strength for 2 turns.

cards.name: Maintain Eye Contact+
cards.description: Enemy loses 3 Strength for 3 turns.

cards.name: Nekomimi
cards.description: At the start of each of your turns, gain 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Nekomimi+
cards.description: At the start of each of your turns, gain 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Presence Concealment
cards.description: Block is not removed at the start of your next X turns.

cards.name: Presence Concealment+
cards.description: Block is not removed at the start of your next X+2 turns.

cards.name: Purple Hair
cards.description:
Lose all Block, gain 1 Thorns for every 4 lost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Purple Hair+
cards.description:
Lose all Block, gain 1 Thorns for every 3 lost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Rest on Table
cards.description: Give a card Retain until the end of combat.

cards.name: Rest on Table+
cards.description: Give a card Retain until the end of combat. The card costs 1 less each time it is Retained.

cards.name: Ridiculously Big
cards.description:
Gain 12 Temporary_HP.
Reduce the amount by 4 until the end of combat; Exhaust if it reaches 0.

cards.name: Ridiculously Big+
cards.description:
Gain 20 Temporary_HP.
Reduce the amount by 4 until the end of combat; Exhaust if it reaches 0.

cards.name: Rocket Punch
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Gain 4 Block.

cards.name: Rocket Punch+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Gain 7 Block.

cards.name: Sakura Five
cards.description: Deal 2 damage 5 times.

cards.name: Sakura Five+
cards.description: Deal 3 damage 5 times.

cards.name: Sakura Labyrinth
cards.description:
Apply 1 Slow.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sakura Labyrinth+
cards.description:
Apply 5 Slow.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sakura Petals
cards.description: Deal 6 damage and apply 2 Poison to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Sakura Petals+
cards.description: Deal 6 damage and apply 4 Poison to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Santa
cards.description:
Exhaust.
Add a random card to your hand.
It's common if X=1.
It's uncommon if X=2.
It's rare if X=3+.
Refund X-3.

cards.name: Santa+
cards.description:
Exhaust.
Add a random card to your hand. It costs 1 less until played.
It's common if X=1.
It's uncommon if X=2.
It's rare if X=3+.
Refund X-3.

cards.name: Schoolgirl
cards.description: Retain your hand this turn.

cards.name: Schoolgirl+
cards.description:
Retain your hand this turn.
Gain 2 Dexterity.

cards.name: Smother
cards.description: Apply 5 alterego_mod:Constricted.

cards.name: Smother+
cards.description: Apply 8 alterego_mod:Constricted.

cards.name: Stockings
cards.description: Deal 7 damage and apply 1 Weak, twice.

cards.name: Stockings+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage and apply 2 Weak, twice.

cards.name: Super Duper Masochism
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Parvati.
Gain 1 Strength for every 10 damage you take this turn.

cards.name: Super Duper Masochism+
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Parvati.
Gain 1 Strength for every 5 damage you take this turn.

cards.name: Support
cards.description: Every time you play an Attack this turn, gain 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Support+
cards.description: Every time you play an Attack this turn, gain 2 Dexterity.

cards.name: Swimsuit
cards.description:
Deal 24 damage.
Gain 1 Vulnerable and 1 Frail.

cards.name: Swimsuit+
cards.description:
Deal 32 damage.
Gain 1 Vulnerable and 1 Frail.

cards.name: Valentine's
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Brynhildr.
Clear a random debuff.

cards.name: Valentine's+
cards.description:
Grave.
Enter alterego_mod:Brynhildr.
Clear ALL debuffs.

cards.name: Alter
cards.description:
Flip your HP.
Take 50% more damage this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Alter+
cards.description:
Flip your HP.
Take 25% more damage this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Alter-Ego
Alter-Ego+
cards.description:
Starting next turn:
Attacks and Skills cost 1 less.

cards.name: Antipathy
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Parvati.
Gain alterego_mod:Best Of 20 alterego_mod:Temp. Invincible.

cards.name: Antipathy+
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Parvati.
Gain alterego_mod:Best Of 10 alterego_mod:Temp. Invincible.

cards.name: Brynhildr Romantia
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Brynhildr.
Deal 28 damage.
If Fatal, raise your Max HP by 3.

cards.name: Brynhildr Romantia+
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Brynhildr.
Deal 32 damage.
If Fatal, raise your Max HP by 4.

cards.name: Class Advantage
cards.description:
Deal 10% more damge.
Take 10% less damage.

cards.name: Class Advantage+
cards.description:
Deal 15% more damge.
Take 15% less damage.

cards.name: GIGA MILK
cards.description: ALL COMBATANTS GAIN STRENGTH EQUAL TO YOUR STRENGTH.

cards.name: GIGA MILK+
cards.description:
ALL COMBATANTS GAIN STRENGTH EQUAL TO YOUR STRENGTH.
(excluding target enemy)

cards.name: Id_es
cards.description:
Play every card in your exhaust pile (except *Id_es).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Id_es+
cards.description:
Retain.
Play every card in your exhaust pile (except *Id_es).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Inside Baseball
cards.description: The first non-boss enemy to attack you this turn flees with 30 gold.

cards.name: Inside Baseball+
cards.description: The first non-boss enemy to attack you flees with 30 gold.

cards.name: Lift
cards.description: Gain 1 Strength for every 10 HP you're missing.

cards.name: Lift+
cards.description: Gain 1 Strength for every 8 HP you're missing.

cards.name: Pain is Pleasure
cards.description: Taking damage instead heals you this turn.

cards.name: Pain is Pleasure+
cards.description: Taking damage instead heals you this turn.

cards.name: Palingenesis
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Can be upgraded any number of times.

cards.name: Palingenesis+1
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Gain 1 Dexterity.
Can be upgraded any number of times.

cards.name: Rake
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Enemy loses 1 Strength and Dexterity at the end of each of its turns.

cards.name: Rake+
cards.description:
Deal 19 damage.
Enemy loses 1 Strength and Dexterity at the end of each of its turns.

cards.name: Ring Break
cards.description: Whenever your block is broken, your next attack deals additional damage equal to the unblocked damage you took.

cards.name: Ring Break+
cards.description: Whenever your block is broken, your next attack deals additional damage equal to the unblocked damage you took.

cards.name: S Tier
cards.description:
Add a random alterego_mod:S Tier card to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: SS Tier
cards.description:
Add two random alterego_mod:S Tier cards to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Tantrum
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Durga.
Your attacks deal double damage for 3 turns.

cards.name: Tantrum+
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Durga.
Your attacks deal double damage for 3 turns.

cards.name: The Sideboob Hour
cards.description: Deal alterego_mod:set damage equal to your run time in minutes.

cards.name: The Sideboob Hour+
cards.description: Deal alterego_mod:set damage equal to your run time in minutes.

cards.name: Trick or Treatment
cards.description: Choose between gaining 4 Regen or 1 alterego_mod:Envenom.

cards.name: Trick or Treatment+
cards.description: Choose between gaining 6 Regen or 2 alterego_mod:Envenom.

cards.name: Valkyrie
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Brynhildr.
Deal 13 damage.
If Fatal, gain 3 Regen.

cards.name: Valkyrie+
cards.description:
Enter alterego_mod:Brynhildr.
Deal 18 damage.
If Fatal, gain 3 Regen.

cards.name: Venus
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage 5 times.
Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Venus+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage 7 times.
Upgrade ALL cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Virgin Laser - Palladion
cards.description: Deal 16 alterego_mod:set damage, ignoring all alterego_mod:impediments.

cards.name: Virgin Laser - Palladion+
cards.description: Deal 20 alterego_mod:set damage, ignoring all alterego_mod:impediments.

cards.name: Vow
cards.description:
Target dies when any enemy dies.
Purge.

cards.name: Vow+
cards.description:
Target dies when any enemy dies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Weigh
cards.description: Deal alterego_mod:set damage equal to your breasts' combined weight in kilograms.

cards.name: Weigh+
cards.description: Deal alterego_mod:set damage equal to your breasts' combined weight in pounds.

relics.name: Masochistic Constitution
relics.description: Gain 1 Max HP after every battle in which you took unblocked damage.
relics.flavorText: Direct all of their hatred towards yourself.

relics.name: Fleeting Love
relics.description: You can take a maximum of 6 damage on the first turn of combat.
relics.flavorText: Wronged by the one you loved, you close your heart off from others.

relics.name: Someone to Fight For
relics.description: Start combat in a random Alterego Stance.
relics.flavorText: Thinking about your lover waiting for you is really motivating!

relics.name: Sister's Ribbon
relics.description:
Right click during combat to activate.
Usable once per combat.
Right click: Move a card from your exhaust pile to your hand.
relics.flavorText: If only you could reach into the past, and talk to her before all of this.

keywords.name: Best Of
keywords.description: This doesn't stack, but does replace if better.

keywords.name: Brynhildr
keywords.description: In this Stance, defeating an enemy heals you for 7.

keywords.name: Constricted
keywords.description: At the end of your turn, take damage.

keywords.name: Durga
keywords.description: In this Stance, your attacks deal half damage and are played twice.

keywords.name: Envenom
keywords.description: Apply Poison whenever you deal unblocked attack damage.

keywords.name: Parvati
keywords.description: In this Stance, enemies who deal 10+ unblocked damage in one hit lose their next action.

keywords.name: Retain+
keywords.description: Not discarded at end of turn, costs 1 less each time this happens.

keywords.name: Set Damage
keywords.description: Not changed by Strength, Weak, etc.

keywords.name: Swipe
keywords.description: Draw the topmost qualifying card from your draw pile. Doesn't shuffle.

keywords.name: S Tier
keywords.description: Feed, Immolate, Adrenaline, Wraith Form, Well Laid Plans, Seek, Blasphemy, Spirit Shield, Lesson Learned.

keywords.name: Temp. Invincible
keywords.description: For one turn, you can't lose more HP than indicated.
